com.loyauty.dao.mybatis.handler
Class LoyautyEnumHandler<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
  com.loyauty.dao.mybatis.handler.LoyautyEnumHandler<E>
Type Parameters:
E -
Direct Known Subclasses:
LanguageHandler
public abstract class LoyautyEnumHandler<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>
extends java.lang.Object

Handles persisting enums in GameJab. In MyBatis, when we want to persist an attribute in a customized way, we should define our own handler to tell MyBatis how to interpret the parameters we send and how to handle the results it returns back. Note: All handlers should implement TypeHandler and override the setParameter and getResult methods.

Author:
Muthanna
